text: Hey folks - are there any timeline expectations we can have about the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/pages|Pages API>? It says it's getting updated, but as we develop against the API we don't want to build something if it's going to change in 2 or 3 weeks...

How/where would you recommend filling in those $ variables? I was following HubSpot's calling SDK postman collection it seems from instructions that if I had an iframe object, it would load. And Five9 has a iframe object link. What more information do I need? (Also, thank you for replying <@U012W4YEUTX>!)
<@U02162GK9SP>  legacy docs

Sorry for the confusion that our legacy docs domain causes. We recently redesigned our documentation. All of our new APIs have a different appearance in the documentation. We do not have a new version of all of our APIs ready yet so we have to keep up our old documentation in the mean time. That's the meaning behind legacy docs. The term legacy docs is not directly tied to deprecation or sunset of any APIs. In general if you can't find the API on our current modern docs the legacy doc version is the only version currently available. It does not mean it's deprecated. To be kept up to date on deprecation announcements please subscribe to the developer changelog, where all of those are announced. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog>
<@U012K9EFASH>

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1623691157266100?thread_ts=1623691157.266100&cid=C2YHAHB6K|https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1623691157266100?thread_ts=1623691157.266100&cid=C2YHAHB6K>
<@U7SL518D6> - the pages API says it's being updated to V3 - this is what we're asking about.
Correct. It is getting a v3 version. We don’t have a timeline to announce at this time. The v2 endpoint doesn’t have a sunset date. You can use the v2 endpoint safely.

Hello everybody.

I’m not very familiar with HubSpot but I have been having a lot of trouble figuring out how to get event data from the APIs. I am working in BI and want to get the CRM data from HubSpot into our data warehouse. There are a few things that I have found very frustrating (compared to pretty much any other data source I have had to deal with) and I am wondering if any of you could help me to get a solution.
1. How can I get the event data for movements through a deal pipeline?
2. Why do the CRM objects not come with all relevant information that HubSpot has for that given object? Is there an easy way to get less-normalized data for the dimensions?
More generally, does anybody have a map that shows the API calls for each HubSpot data object?

Thanks for your help! :partying_face:

Hello everyone.
Can someone please help me with the issue I am facing.
I am trying to integrate HubSpot to pull data from my react app. But I am unable to find the useful information how this can be achieved.

Hi everyone,
Can anyone provide some insight on a problem I'm seeing regarding Folders?
I just deleted all of the files and folders via the HubSpot Web App, and I'm trying to create new folders via the API.
The create folders API returns success, but if I run the search all folders, or even try to find the folder via the web app's GUI, it's not there.
The response from the Create Folders API says that the folder is archived, but I did not create it to be archived.
My hypothesis is that the previously deleted folder is still archived somewhere, and not fully deleted, so I cannot create a new folder with that name until it is.
Is this correct? If so, what can I do to delete all of those folders?
Thanks, Jon.

Hey folks - <@U024KN7E87R> on our team has been attempting to use the old 'create a new page' endpoint found <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/pages/post_pages?_ga=2.227023903.363005132.1623682783-148130799.1623166128|here>,  however, the docs don't specify where to put the actual contents of the page, and we're starting to think this endpoint has a different purpose entirely.

• Is it possible to fully create a new 'page' with this endpoint? 
• If so, where/in what form the contents are provided?
You would provide the page content in widget_containers and widgets. Widgets refers to Custom modules in the CMS. All content lives inside of custom modules.
Performing a `GET` on a page can give you a peek at the format it expects.
<@U024KN7E87R> ^ FYI - the v2 API can be used safely as noted above.
Ok thanks! I wasn't sure if it was widgets because the Blogs API has a dedicated parameter for the HTML Body in addition to having widgets. Thanks again

My suggestion - because the structure of widget containers, and the structure of individual widgets depends on the templates and modules used for the page - I would recommend creating a page using the template you want to use first, modify the values for the module fields you will need to update via API (they won’t be returned in a GET until they’ve been updated because module fields assume the default if no value is set).

Once you’ve done that you can make a get request on the page. Then use that to make your post’s to create pages.
Yeah blogs are special - because they have a standard “post body”, whereas pages you’re not going to have the same structure to every page. So it’s handled with widgets(aka modules)
Got it, that makes a lot of sense
No idea what is supposed to go in there, but pretty sure it will not work as is
<@UFBNA9K9A> ?

1. probably need to hook up a workflow to monitor for said events and call a webhook
2. need more information on what you are asking specifically... what does "relevant information" mean, and what does "less-normalized data for the dimensions" mean?

need way more detail on what you are trying to do, generally speaking, a plain React app by itself would not be able to securely integrate with HubSpot, you need some server side code because you have to use OAuth / API Key to call the APIs and storing that in the client would cause a security breach

I think there are ways to Delete, and to GDPR Delete, files / folders, which have different behavior

<@UFBNA9K9A>?
<@U012W4YEUTX> I have a form in my react app, I want to submit that form data in HubSpot as a contact details using HubSpot API
This is the form and details I am asking my users to submit.. I want as soon as user clicks the button, the details should be sent to HubSpot and create a contact with these details.
